community.name: GDG Batna
community.description: GDG Batna is a local Google Developer Group that brings together developers, designers, and tech enthusiasts in Batna, Algeria. The community focuses on learning, sharing knowledge, and growing together through events, workshops, and collaborative projects.

eventsLifecycle.name: Ice Break
eventsLifecycle.description: The Ice Break event helps new members officially join the GDG Batna team. It focuses on introductions, networking, understanding the community structure, and building strong connections between members.

eventsLifecycle.name: Ideathon
eventsLifecycle.description: The Ideathon focuses on teamwork and creativity. Members collaborate to improve their skills in UI/UX design, product design, marketing, and problem-solving. Teams build prototypes and share innovative ideas.

eventsLifecycle.name: Hackathons
eventsLifecycle.description: GDG Batna organizes internal and external hackathons where members apply their technical and creative skills to solve real-world problems.

eventsLifecycle.name: DevFest
eventsLifecycle.description: DevFest is the flagship annual event of GDG Batna. It represents the culmination of the seasonâ€™s activities and plays an important role in preparing members for future events and opportunities.

programs.name: Dev Challenges Platform
programs.description: A competitive platform designed to improve real-world developer skills through structured challenges.
rules: AI is allowed but core logic must be original

programs.name: Dev Sessions
programs.description: Weekly or scheduled technical sessions covering different development domains such as mobile, web, and backend.

programs.name: Dive Into Dev
programs.description: A content creation initiative where members contribute technical videos and educational content.

howToJoin: Join GDG Batna via the official community page
Follow GDG Batna on social media
